title: All my rune pages got deleted.
body:
Logged in, went to get into a custom game like I do to test ping. I'm so glad I did because in getting into the game, I realized all my rune pages were gone. I've got 11 of them, and I had roughly 9-10 of them made into custom saved pages. Basically I'm saying I have no reason to only use presets, but yet here they are and they're all I have access to. 

In fact, I actually had the presets hidden. Guess this is the punishment I get for not using the premade pages. 

https://i.gyazo.com/4e08bffb3b0a4f79f28106eae9ba6377.jpg

I'm so glad I actually got into a custom first. I can't imagine how badly this would've ruined a game.
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
We have/had scattered reports if this one but it's bit hard to nail down - did you make all of your pages in one session (i.e all the pages before logging off?) Or did you made them over multiple sessions? 'A session' can be multiple days but only one 'login' if that makes sense (ex: I login Monday but leave my computer on and logged in to League til Wed, that's one session). 

We think there's something weird with hitting the server to save them, so that info will help us  rule things out. 

EDIT: Ty to all the people posting their situations, helps a lot. Will show this to folks on Monday.

> [{quoted}](name=Sparkle,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=RZ3K92TF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-09T21:17:34.835+0000)
>
> We have/had scattered reports if this one but it's bit hard to nail down - did you make all of your pages in one session (i.e all the pages before logging off?) Or did you made them over multiple sessions? 'A session' can be multiple days but only one 'login' if that makes sense (ex: I login Monday but leave my computer on and logged in to League til Wed, that's one session). 
> 
> We think there's something weird with hitting the server to save them, so that info will help us  rule things out. 
> 
> EDIT: Ty to all the people posting their situations, helps a lot. Will show this to folks on Monday.

THIS BUG IS STILL HAPPENING
My rune pages also deleted

> [{quoted}](name=Sparkle,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=RZ3K92TF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-09T21:17:34.835+0000)
>
> We have/had scattered reports if this one but it's bit hard to nail down - did you make all of your pages in one session (i.e all the pages before logging off?) Or did you made them over multiple sessions? 'A session' can be multiple days but only one 'login' if that makes sense (ex: I login Monday but leave my computer on and logged in to League til Wed, that's one session). 
> 
> We think there's something weird with hitting the server to save them, so that info will help us  rule things out. 
> 
> EDIT: Ty to all the people posting their situations, helps a lot. Will show this to folks on Monday.

I made all in one session - but since I play multiple champions - i kept changing one thing or the other before the game. Anyway, whenever this happens to me... "i get the Season 9 Pop-up" - as if this is the beginning of the season and this is the first time i check that (obviously that's not the case).
The same thing happened to me on the patch before the current one, but I didn't make my runes all at once.
Thanks for information - do you remember anything more about the pages vs them getting deleted? Amount of pages you had, how many you lost, which ones they were, etc?
I tried to edit my runes and save them about right before game started and when game ended i didnt have the page anymore

I noticed it doesn't matter how many pages I save, I tried 1, 5, 7 pages, they still get deleted.  I tried logging out, then back in, the pages were deleted; I created 5 new ones, logged out to test, they got deleted.  Then I created a single one, to test again, logged out, came back and it was deleted.

This has happened to me 3 times. Twice last patch and once this patch. Each time it was all 20 of my rune pages. All 20 were created in one session, though i often tweak whichever one I am using in champ select, so they would have been edited over multiple sessions.
Uhm, I think I had 10 at the time, lost all of them. They were a variety of setups, can't remember too well, sorry.

This just happened to both my wife and myself.

I have 16 available rune pages (2 free plus 2 * 7-page purchases)

I had created about 9 of my 16 available. Then a few days ago, I deleted all and remade them so they would be better organized. I ended up with 15 when I did the re-do. I play daily and usually restart the client once or twice per day. No problems.

Yesterday, I created my 16th page (last available). I did a reset of the client (close and then re-open) prior to the session tonight where I ran into problems. 

The problems persisted. During champ select on realizing I had no rune pages, I was getting errors while creating the rune page for that game. Fortunately I was able to get the correct runes saved and used. Fortunately I had chosen my main champ so I knew my rune page and could do it quickly even with the error bugs that I was getting while trying to get it done. But it could've been disaster.

Thank you everyone for making this known.  
Just had it happen to me and thought Riot really wanted me to use their rune pages.  Glad to know I am not alone with this bug.  I myself just have 5 rune pages all done in one session a while ago.

I ran into this when I logged into a different account from the same computer, then logged back into my main. All my pages were gone.

Posting from main
Alt: CountLucien
My pages runes got deleted a moment ago, I didn't do any upgrade or anything special, I was playing in the morning, stopped some hours and in the afternoon they were gone.

I'm a bit late to this, but I made all my pages way before they were deleted. I hadn't actually made a new page in almost a week, I'd guess, other than making a quick page for one game, then deleting it after. All the important pages I lost had been made pretty much as soon as the new runes system came out, and were just edited along the way for the first week or so.
This just happened to me. I made all of my pages in one day, and I also tend to leave league running for a really long time (days or weeks).
Hmm ok. Thank you for the info
20 Rune pages, this will be the third time I have to re-create them all. Please fix this issue. Thank you.

i have the same prob like 1mounth now i re-create pages every 2day is any chance u got a way to solve the problem? i tried some staffs they told but it doesnt work.. like PC>C:>Riot Game>Congif delete all files inside and log to costum game. after that new files will poop exit game>restart lol client but dident help :/{{item:3070}}

I know this is an old thread but my rune pages just got deleted for the 3re time in 4 days. WTH is going on? I have never seen this before and I am getting sick of remaking 10 rune pages! Also, the client is so laggy/glitchy.... Everyone says so. Please at least fix this rune issue asap! Oh and 2 of my friends have experienced the same issue within the past couple of weeks! Please for the love of God! Thanks- Saosun
It happen to me too, every time I loge in my runes gets deleted pls riot fix this

My rune pages got deleted as well. So did my husband's. We both have made them over several patches on our accounts.

I hope you resolve this soon.
it told me "welcome to season 2019" and deleted all my runes. well gee client, thanks.
It happened to me twice after the recent patch! Is there a fix available? or a way to back them up locally like item sets?
just happened to me again
I got 6/7 runes and all gone , dont know what happpen but I miss my AD/AP/ThreshSupp/Runestest/APsupp/TankSupp RUNES . :)
7 months since the original post and yet to be a solution..... So rito, when are you going to put the mass amounts of money that WE give you to good use and fix your stuff?

This happens to me pretty much every other time I log in.

I've had my rune pages set for months, and really only use one page and just change it on the fly before the match starts.

I pretty much have to go straight to my runes under collection before I start a queue to see if I got the bug, and if it is bugged I just restart my client until it brings them back.

I generally restart my client daily.
Just had the same problem. ALL rune pages suddenly deleted except for default??
Same happened to me, I login just now and all my custom rune pages are gone and I discovered that during the champion selection in a rank game. sigh well i know riot dont care about my lost.
really cbf to make them again, hope somehow riot can relocate those missed rune pages in my account before i play again. not mad but this is really stupid and annoying.

This just happened to me 2 days ago. In season 7 I bought 7 rune pages with RP and got no problem with them since ereyesterday. Before that I actually renamed all of them multiple times to make it easier to distinguish between them and the preset pages. I did it one day before the update which made the preset pages also disappear in the game-lobby if you checked the box with hiding the preset ones. So in other words I changed all of their names in one session. After I realized they got deleted I made 2 new ones and after I checked today, they also got deleted.
In my perspective this has nothing to do with how they are named, because most of them I named ">3: Sorcery", but after the first time they got deleted I named one simply "Precision".
btw I'm using championify if that has anything to do with that and atm I couldn't look into the shop or in the loot tab.
today I can visit the shop and loot tab again, but my rune pages keep deleting itself.
same for me! runepages are deleted and as soon as i exit the client all of them get deleted again. also i cant access my emote wheel anymore getting the error EM01?!
just logged in to find all of my rune pages had been deleted too. I had roughly 9/12 completed pages.

This just happened to me. I had 10 different runes pages. created in different sessions.
Are they just gone? Will i get them back?
It happened after you "fixed" the mission/game history thing. Sucks pretty bad if you realize that while creating a game...

just logged in today and all my runes were gone.
Fix it please.

Yea same thing happened to me. i had about 7 rune pages and all of them are gone. on both my accounts. was hoping there was a fix for this. getting really tired of having to keep redoing them before a game

The same thing has happened to me twice since the new rune system has been launched. The first time happened about a month or so ago. The second time just happened last night. The pages were not made in one session, although after the second time the deletion happened I did re-make them in one session.

Try running a full repair then making 1-2 pages and exiting the client.  I've had my pages disappeared 2 days in a row now after exiting the client and launching it later on that day or next day. I ran the full repair made 2 pages and logged out and relaunched and my 2 pages are still there.

mine got delteded today to just this morning i loged in all were gone i made them over a cuple of logins not one or two more like 6 7 i hade lke 5 6 or 7 pages omg how can i gett them back im not gonna make all this work again they were custum i worked over alot of them and i dont remember how to make them again :X

this probably doesn't help with the root cause of your issue with pages getting deleted but don't forget you can now edit rune pages before a game with the new runes.  I know you paid for the rune pages so you shouldn't have to just a friendly reminder so you're not screwed :)
